name: Drakontas
tag_list: consumer, government, enterprise, wireless, mobile, communications, collaboration, software
overview:
Drakontas develops develops collaboration software solutions and provides technology consulting and training programs to Federal, state, and local governments, serving the defense, law enforcement, criminal justice, transportation and consumer markets.

To date, the company has developed and released three (3) solutions:

DragonForce, developed for first responders and law enforcement tactical teams, facilitates command and control (C2) by establishing a common operating picture among users. DragonForce provides a variety of situation awareness features: real-time tracking, text messaging, presence and device status, shared media, and collaborative whiteboarding. It operates on mobile smartphones, portable laptops and desktop workstations. In addition, DragonForce can be deployed over a variety of IP networks, including commercial wireless (e.g., 2.5G, 3G), Wi-Fi, WiMAX and mobile mesh networks.

LABFx, released in 2010, is a web-based collaboration and information exchange platform for forensics labs and the broader criminal justice community that enhances collaboration, improves workflow and produces measurable outcomes and metrics.

Smyle, released in 2011, is a free social collaboration application for the consumer, available for the Android platform, that enables people to plan social gatherings and events, exchange group chat messages, see other users’ location on a shared map and annotate on images and other digital whiteboards. To learn more, visit https://smylenow.com/.

For more information about Drakontas, visit www.drakontas.com.
